text:
winningisabrees says: Mar 7, 2017 10:50 AM 
Saints…. Sign this guy…. We haven’t had a returner since…. well Michael Lewis, The Original Beer Man….. I’m getting old. tritz32 says: Mar 7, 2017 10:55 AM 
Please, please, please stay in the division CP84. The Vikings traded up into the first round to take a player who only has value as a KR which is a position being legislated out of the league. Classic purples!! #Bust SKOLOLOL!!! Mar 7, 2017 11:04 AM 
Bears have White, Jeffery, Wilson, Meredith, Bellamy, Thompson, Miller, Royal…when healthy. 
How about focusing on the Defense Secondary which has been god awful???!!! Mar 7, 2017 11:07 AM 
Building around Glennon… Three words that make you throw up in your mouth. Mar 7, 2017 11:09 AM 
where was the commitment to build around Cutler? filthymcnasty3 says: Mar 7, 2017 11:10 AM 
He will do whatever he can to get out of MN, especially now that the hometown newspaper has forever labeled it “Loserville, USA”. tjacks7 says: Mar 7, 2017 11:13 AM 
Patterson was railroaded by Norv and disappeared for two years as Zimmer had no desire to be involved in the offense. Granted, he may have slacked off for a bit after his rookie year, but he’s far to valuable to ride the pines like Norv had him do. Patterson is tailor made for Shurmur, hence his reemergence. If he goes to a coach with a clue on offense he’ll be the steal of free agency. Mar 7, 2017 11:16 AM 
Please, please replace Alshon Jeffery with Cordarelle Patterson… 
Bears… Vikings fan here… Do it…. I double dare you… wademaxwell1990 says: Mar 7, 2017 11:18 AM 
Stay away from him. The Bears need to stay at the bottom of the division right where they belong! Vikings need to resign him if they are letting Peterson walk Mar 7, 2017 11:27 AM 
mialto says: Mar 7, 2017 11:04 AM 
Bears have White, Jeffery, Wilson, Meredith, Bellamy, Thompson, Miller, Royal…when healthy. 
How about focusing on the Defense Secondary which has been god awful???!!! 
- Jeffery is pretty well gone, and Wilson and Thompson are FA. Royal is going to be released, and Miller hasn’t finished a season in 6 years. If they are signing him to be more than a KR and 4th or 5th WR, I will be concerned, but if it is for that role, it makes a lot of sense. They need bodies right now, because the only receivers under contract are Bellamy, White, Braverman, and Royal (to be released). That does not inspire confidence as a group. Leave a Reply
